entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
